objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Drama lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to education and learning in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about education and learning using slang register
Students create original drama themed content about education and learning in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Drama story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using slang register in drama context
Character B: Responding in slang register within drama theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
